Jx.Store.Strategy.Full

Extends: Jx.Store.Strategy

This is a strategy for loading all of the data from a source at one time.

Summary
Jx.Store.Strategy.FullExtends: Jx.Store.Strategy
Functions
activateactivates the strategy if it isn’t already active.
deactivatedeactivates the strategy if it is already active.
loadCalled as the eventhandler for the store load method.

Functions

activate

activate: function ()

activates the strategy if it isn’t already active.

deactivate

deactivate: function ()

deactivates the strategy if it is already active.

load

load: function (params)

Called as the eventhandler for the store load method.  Can also be called independently to load data into the current store.

Parameters

paramsa hash of parameters to use in loading the data.
